OUR_NEWS_HEADING.en: This fintech company helps you pay your children’s school fees

OUR_NEWS_CONTENT_PARA_1.en: The rising cost of education is a concern for parents, particularly the middleclass who want to give the best for their children. Banks that give loans for higher education have not been kind to school students. Now, a Chennai-based fintech company promises to bridge this gap.

OUR_NEWS_CONTENT_PARA_2.en: Estimates show that an average Indian middle-class family spends 25% of its income on children’s education. “There is a huge credit gap in education, especially for those in the K-12 segment and those who take IIT-JEE, NEET, and UPSC exams, besides graduates and those seeking upskilling. We are here to fill this gap,” says Prashanth P K, CEO, Advancesure Tech Pvt Ltd that launched ‘Edufin

APP_PROMOTION_SUB_HEADING.en: Unlock opportunities with Edufin Mobile Application

APP_PROMOTION_CONTENT.en: The go-to app for fast, secure personal and education loans. Whether you're funding your education or managing personal expenses, our app provides quick approvals, flexible repayment options, and transparent terms.

FOOTER_COMPANY_UNIT.en: A Unit of Advansure Tech Pvt. Ltd.

FOOTER_LIST_ITEM_ADDRESS.en: No 23/1, Ground Floor, Cathedral Garden Road, Nungambakkam, Chennai - 600034

TESTIMONIALS_SUBHEADING.en: What our institutional partners have to say!

TESTIMONIALS_1_CONTENT.en:
Edufin's innovative financing solutions have revolutionized the way we operate, significantly improving our cash flow and allowing us to focus on delivering world-class education. Their balanced and effective solution has alleviated financial stress for our families, enabling them to prioritize their children's education without worrying about financial burdens.
We highly recommend Edufin to any educational institution seeking a reliable and efficient financing partner.

TESTIMONIALS_1_AUTHOR_DESIGNATION.en: Secretary of Mathakondapalli Model School, Hosur

TESTIMONIALS_2_CONTENT.en: Edufin's combination of full upfront payments and flexible monthly plans has greatly enhanced our financial management. Their responsive support team ensures smooth operations. This model provides financial stability for us and simplifies payments for parents. We recommend Edufin for their efficient and beneficial approach.

TESTIMONIALS_2_AUTHOR_DESIGNATION.en: Chief Mentor and Managing Director Achariya World Class Education

TESTIMONIALS_3_CONTENT.en: As a school, partnering with Edufin has been a seamless and positive experience. Our school parents were extremely pleased with the ease of securing financing for their children's fees, which made the payment process much more manageable for them. We appreciate the reliability and efficiency that Edufin brings to the table and look forward to continuing our partnership.

TESTIMONIALS_3_AUTHOR_DESIGNATION.en: AVP Marketing, Navkis Educational Centre (Bangalore & Mysore)

WHY_CHOOSE_US_SUBHEADING.en: We specialize in tailored financial solution for individuals and educational institutions

HERO_CAROUSEL_DESCRIPTION_1.en: Quick processing, Fees paid directly to the Institute with  complete Digital process & minimal paper work

HERO_CAROUSEL_DESCRIPTION_2.en: Institutional upgrades, Holiday, Shopping, Wedding, Home renovation? we have got you covered.

HERO_CAROUSEL_TITLE_3_PART_2.en: in India & Abroad with easy, hassle-free financing!

HERO_CAROUSEL_DESCRIPTION_3.en: With flexible, transparent & quick processing, we customize your finance requirement based on every milestone in your academic journey

HERO_CAROUSEL_DESCRIPTION_4.en: Edufin as partner makes Annual fee collection simple to bring financial stability, operational efficiency, increase in enrolment & student success

FEE_FINANCE_1.en: Making Education Affordable, One Fee at a Time

FEE_FINANCE_2.en: Say goodbye to big fees, hello to easy payments!

FEE_FINANCE_3.en: Edufin’s fee financing is designed to make education more accessible for students and their families. Instead of worrying about large upfront fees, you can break down fees into manageable monthly instalments. Our fast and simple application process ensures you have access to the funds you need, when you need them. Whether it’s School, college or specialized courses, we’re here to help you focus on education, not finances.

FEE_FINANCE_4.en: Affordable Fee Financing for a Brighter Tomorrow

FEE_FINANCE_5.en: Edufin specializes in fee financing solutions that make education accessible and affordable for families. From K12 schools to higher education and upskilling programs, we ensure that families have access to flexible payment options, minimizing financial hurdles along the way. Our partnerships with educational institutions mean that students can focus on their future, and families can stay financially comfortable with flexible monthly payments.

HEA_1.en: Make the World Your Classroom with Edufin

HEA_2.en: Your passport to studying abroad, minus the money hurdles.

HEA_3.en: Edufin Supports students achieve their dreams of studying abroad by providing comprehensive Educational loan solutions through our trusted finance partners, including Avanse, HDFC, IDFC, and TATA Capital. Covering tuition, travel, living expenses and more, our loan options offer flexible repayment plans and a streamlined application process to make funding your global education easier than ever. Whether pursuing a degree in the US, UK, Australia, or beyond, Edufin ensures your financial strategy matches your worldwide ambitions.

HEA_5.en: Achieve Your International Education Goals with EduFin’s Customized Loan Solutions

HEA_6.en: EduFin makes your dream of studying abroad a reality by offering loan options designed to cover all aspects of your international education. Whether you plan to study in the USA, UK, Germany, or other top destinations, our partnerships with trusted lenders like HDFC Credila, TATA Finance, Avanse, and IDFC Bank, and many more, ensure that you receive the financial flexibility and support to succeed.

FF_9.en: Enjoy personalized repayment periods to fit your financial needs, letting you pay at your own pace.

FF_10.en: No Interest to Low Cost EMI

FF_11.en: Choose zero to low-interest EMI options for budget-friendly payments without burdening your wallet.

FF_13.en: Stay on track effortlessly with automatic monthly debits, ensuring timely payments and peace of mind.

FF_15.en: Secure your finances with complimentary insurance protection, providing added safety with every plan.
